databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID, VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID

select MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID, VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY where MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID = :MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY( MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID, VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID, :VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME, :DELETE_FLAG, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY SET VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME = :VESSEL_CATEGORY_NAME, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
where MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID = :MS_VESSEL_CATEGORY_ID and TS = :TS
